ygData.subject: A little off subject.
ygData.msgSnippet: When I was running around akanon today to find some merchant that sold jewelry stuff I ran into King Akanon. And I noticed something. He s not a gnome. I mean
ygData.messageBody:
When I was running around akanon today to find some merchant that sold
jewelry stuff I ran into King Akanon. And I noticed something. He's not a
gnome. I mean why would we have a King that isn't a gnome? Or if he is the
King why doesn't he have anything on? He's naked (no visible items). Also
when I went to the top of the King Akanon Palace I found something that looks
like an arrow. It points to the merchant that sells fishing stuff that is to
the left of the big waterfall near entrance.
